textAfterTable: About Sunstone Sunstone is a magazine published by the Sunstone Education Foundation, Inc., a 501(c)(3) nonprofit corporation, that discusses Mormonism through scholarship, art, short fiction, and poetry. Please consider supporting Sunstone by making a donation. Mission The mission of The Sunstone Education Foundation is to sponsor open forums of Mormon thought and experience. We examine and express the rich spiritual, intellectual, social, and artistic qualities of Mormon history and contemporary life. We encourage humanitarian service, honest inquiry, and responsible interchange of ideas that is respectful of all people and what they hold sacred.
